cscie55.project

Interface Bank

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BankImpl

    public interface Bank
extends java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    Bank interface that contains the methods that the Bank remote object is capable of doing.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Account getAccount(AccountInfo accountInfo)
      Performs a basic linear search for a bank account given an AccountInfo object.
      void setAccount(AccountInfo accountInfo, Account account)
      Updates a given account.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccount

        Account getAccount(AccountInfo accountInfo)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Performs a basic linear search for a bank account given an AccountInfo object.
        Parameters:
        accountInfo - Object containing the account's number and pin.
        Returns:
        Account object that corresponds with the given parameters.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If operation couldn't be done.

      • setAccount

        void setAccount(AccountInfo accountInfo,
              Account account)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Updates a given account.
        Parameters:
        accountInfo - Object containing the account's number and pin.
        account - Account object to set.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If operation couldn't be done.
